title: Point Reyes National Seashore: News
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News             News       Point Reyes National Seashore makes every effort to keep the public informed about news events, accomplishments, employee recognitions, special and recurring events which occur within and around the units of the Park Service. Point Reyes National Seashore issues news releases to local and regional newspapers, and publishes Visitor Guides and other newsletters. Park Wavelengths is a bi-weekly email that contains natural and cultural history information, notices about events and other news about the Seashore. For all press inquiries, contact the park's Public Information Officer at 415-464-5135 or by email.
